item.title: About
item.description: First things first some rapid fire facts: I’m 24 I’m gay My Pronouns are They/Them or He/Him I like to fuck around with tech I’m really into Gunpla With that out of the way let’s go ahead and explain some of the points of this blog: I’ll be posting breakdowns on my homelab projects here I’ll also be posting some Gunpla WIPs I might even do some game reviews, Etc.
item.content:
First things first some rapid fire facts:

  • I’m 24
  • I’m gay
  • My Pronouns are They/Them or He/Him
  • I like to fuck around with tech
  • I’m really into Gunpla

With that out of the way let’s go ahead and explain some of the points of this blog:

  • I’ll be posting breakdowns on my homelab projects here
  • I’ll also be posting some Gunpla WIPs
  • I might even do some game reviews, Etc.
